channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish fly tipped by the cycle hangar on Cator St, 14th September
item.description:
Hi there, there has been a box of rubbish fly tipped by the cycle hangar on Cator St just outside Tayo Situ House. Please could this be cleared away. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cator Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Once again car parked in front of emergency barrier, 14th September
item.description:
I have reported this before and you say it has been dealt with IT CLEARLY HASNT Car once again blocking the emergency services barrier, if a child/adult were to be injured on the field the emergency services would not have access. This is an ongoing problem at the weekends with footballers and their families thinking it’s ok just to park in front of this barrier with no regard for its use. You have said you will add signage, you haven’t, you have said you will monitor, again you haven’t. Please have some regard for the intended use of this barrier.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Grove Park Road, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox in the gutter, 14th September
item.description:
There is a dead fox in the gutter on the corner of St Mary's Avenue and Winchester Road. I can see that there was a report of a dead fox in the road further up St Mary's Avenue on the evening of 13th September. I have no idea whether this is the same fox, which has been moved, or another one

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Mary's Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
